title: Textile, 1920–30
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: block print on plain weave
description: Polychrome block print on natural linen. Off-set rows of oval framed basket of flowers. Frame made of twisting lavender ribbons. Basket of purple, yellow flowers with greenery. Between rows are areas of purple "picotage" and purple flower heads.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1920–30.
1920–30. Medium: linen
Technique: block print on plain weave. Gift of Mrs. Germaine Little. 1968-110-54.
